OOC:is it legal that every bot shot 25 times in the same post?

Luzbel/Attila/Kali/Shiva/Bat-probes/Black fortress's defences::

Luzbel and Attila avoided the shot and shot against Iguanus (25 
shots) while Kali and Shivah did the same against Slayer (two of them 
are missile-signatures, 25 hots)

Bat-probes and Fortress did the same.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> In the distance Ignatius used his enhanced Eagle eyes to view the 
battle.
> "Ignatius to Slayer, watch for my energy signature." The eagle 
called out
> over Trainer frequency. His eyes glared as he selected his targets. 
Three
> glowing blasts erupted from his Eagle optics intended for the Bat 
probes
> flying around Slayer.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 8:21 AM
> Subject: Re: The Blackfortress
> 
> 
> > ::Slayer::
> >
> > Slayer whirls out of the way of the incoming shots. The war suit
> > designed for him from K-9's body parts by Blaze was holding up 
nicely,
> > but he was still shedding some mechfluid where the suit had been
> > punctured. He activates the infared goggles, looking around and 
seeing
> > where the enemies were firing at him from better than before. 
What he
> > needed was a drill to get to Prebon, or....
> >
> > Slayer lowers in altitude, able to see his enemies and avoid most 
of
> > the attacks. The shots that did hit him didn't do too much 
damage, but
> > he tried to avoid them all anyways. Thanks to his scanners and 
infared
> > vision, he could see the entrance to the tunnel that Prebon was 
in.
> >
> > Slayer aims a missile from each of his two shoulder-mounted 
missile
> > launcher at the two bots firing at him, letting loose two
> > signature-seeking missiles at each. He gets a lock on the 
entrance to
> > the tunnel, preparing two more missiles.
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Ignatius stood outside the trainers base waiting for a sign from
> > Slayer.
> > >
> > > . "Hey, I wouldn't mind some backup over here,"  comes over the 
comm
> > from
> > > Slayer. The sign was clear that the Trainers were seriously
> > outnumbered.
> > >
> > > "I'm on my way." Ignatius calls out into his own comm as he 
takes
> > off
> > > skyward toward Slayers location.
> > >
> > > meanwhile in the fortress Slayers message reached his leader.
> > >
> > > "Commander, I can't hold out much longer. I'm fighting an army
> > here." Slayer
> > > sounded desperate but his loyalty came through without question.
> > >
> > > To weak to reply Prebon pressed a button on his comm activating 
a
> > homing
> > > beacon directed to transmetal technology. The resonance was 
designed
> > for
> > > just this type of emergency. "Keep up the good fight Slayer." he
> > thought as
> > > the Trainer leader struggled for consciousness "You will be 
rewarded
> > well."
> > >
> > >
> > >
